user.title: Login to Lynk & Co
user.description:
To authenticate, please follow these steps:

1. Click the link below to open the Lynk & Co login page:

**[Open Login Page]({auth_url})**

2. Complete the login process (including any CAPTCHA and 2FA SMS code).

3. After login, the browser will try to redirect to a URL starting with `msauth://...` - this will **fail** (that's expected).

4. Open your browser's developer console (press F12), go to the Console tab, and find the failed redirect URL.

5. Copy the entire URL (starting with `msauth://prod.lynkco.app.crisp.prod/...`) and paste it below.

reauth.title: Re-authentication Required
reauth.description: Please re-authenticate your Lynk & Co account using the same process as initial setup.

error.invalid_redirect_uri: The provided redirect URI is invalid. It should start with 'msauth://prod.lynkco.app.crisp.prod/'.
error.invalid_email: The provided email is invalid. Please check and try again.
error.invalid_2fa_code: The provided 2FA code is invalid. Please check and try again.
error.login_failed: Login failed. This may be due to a CAPTCHA. Please try the Redirect Login method instead.
error.token_error: Failed to obtain tokens from the redirect URI. Please try again with a fresh login.
error.two_factor_auth_failed: Two-factor authentication failed. Please try again.

abort.no_vins_found: No vehicles found for your account. Please make sure you have a vehicle registered with Lynk & Co.

init.title: Lynk & Co Integration Settings
init.description:
Configure your Lynk & Co integration settings.

**Smart Polling** adapts update frequency based on charging status and time of day. When disabled, legacy fixed interval polling is used.

data.experimental: Enable experimental features (use at your own risk)
data.smart_polling_enabled: Enable Smart Polling (recommended for EV charging)
data.active_hours_start: Active hours start (hour, random +0-20 min added)
data.active_hours_end: Active hours end (hour, random +0-20 min added)
data.charging_target_percent: Charging target percentage (slows polling when reached)
data.scan_interval: Legacy: Fixed scan interval (minutes, used when smart polling disabled)
